text: Vladimir Sergeyevich Bushin (; January 24, 1924Статья Владимира Бушина «Барчук» – December 25, 2019) was a Soviet-Russian writer, essayist, literary critic, columnist and social activist. He was a member of the Union of Soviet Writers and Communist.Информация о мероприятиях, посвященных 20-летию расстрела Верховного Совета РФ He was born in Moscow. He was a critic of Boris Yeltsin and Vladimir Putin. His works were about Joseph Stalin and how he was a positive figure of the Soviet Union. Bushin died in Moscow on December 25, 2019 of cardiopulmonary arrest, aged 95.Скончался писатель Владимир Бушин ==References== ==Other websites== * Владимир Бушин.
